title: ITC Chairman Puri says company's hotels business to provide stability to overall business
description: ITC Ltd chairman Sanjiv Puri said that the company's continued shareholding in the demerged hotel business entity is to provide stability, assure stakeholders and leverage institutional strengths. The company aims to sharpen capital allocation, asset efficiency ratios and unlock value for shareholders. Puri added that ITC has immense opportunity to grow its fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) business and has launched nearly 300 new products in the past three years.
